title: "AI flight makes emergency landing in Mumbai as engine shuts down mid-air"
excerpt: "An A320neo plane of Tata Group-run Air India returned to the Mumbai airport just 27 minutes after take off as one of its engines shut down mid-air due to a technical issue, sources said on Friday."
